detail_desc: Coat in an Italian wool blend with notch lapels, buttons down the front and decorative buttons at the cuffs. Decorative chest pocket, welt side pockets with a flap, one inner pocket and a single back vent. Lined. The wool content of the coat is recycled.

Coat in an Italian wool blend with notch lapels, buttons down the front and decorative buttons at the cuffs. Decorative chest pocket, welt side pockets with a flap, one inner pocket and a single back vent. Lined. The wool content of the coat is recycled.

Padded jacket in woven fabric with a stand-up collar and zip down the front. Concealed, zipped pockets in the side seams, and narrow ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined. Filling 80% down, 20% feathers.

Padded jacket in woven fabric with a stand-up collar and zip down the front. Concealed, zipped pockets in the side seams, and narrow ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined. Filling 80% down, 20% feathers.
Lightly padded, quilted jacket in woven fabric with a ribbed jersey collar, dropped shoulders and two-way zip down the front. Side pockets and short slits in the sides. Lined.
Jumper knitted in a merino wool and cashmere blend with a ribbed stand-up collar and zip at the top. Long sleeves with elbow patches, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Jumper knitted in a merino wool and cashmere blend with a ribbed stand-up collar and zip at the top. Long sleeves with elbow patches, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Pull-on trousers in soft denim with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and narrow elastication at the hems.

Set with a long-sleeved top, pair of leggings and pair of shorts in jersey. Top with a sewn-on bow and print motif on the front. Leggings and shorts with an elasticated waist and all-over print. Shorts with a sewn-on bow at the front.
Long-sleeved jersey top with reversible sequins on the front and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Boxer briefs in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and a decorative bow at the front. Lined gusset.

Pyjamas with a strappy top and shorts in woven fabric. V-neck top in a double layer with narrow, double shoulder straps. Shorts with an elasticated waist and frill-trimmed hems.
Lightly padded jacket in nylon with a ribbed stand-up collar, zip down the front with a chin guard, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.

Lightly padded all-in-one suit in woven fabric. Pile-lined hood with sewn-on ears at the top, a zip with a chin guard at the front and elastication at the cuffs and hems. Foldover mitts and feet to keep the hands and feet warm. Soft pile lining.

Lightly padded all-in-one suit in woven fabric. Pile-lined hood with sewn-on ears at the top, a zip with a chin guard at the front and elastication at the cuffs and hems. Foldover mitts and feet to keep the hands and feet warm. Soft pile lining.
Mesh laundry bags with a zip.
Tops in cotton jersey with wide, printed shoulder straps and an elasticated hem.
High-cut top in soft cotton jersey with a racer back and elasticated hem.
Crop tops in soft jersey with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and narrow elastication at the hem.
Crop tops in soft jersey with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and narrow elastication at the hem.
Pleated skirt in stretch jersey with a sheen. Elasticated waist and sewn-in wrapover at the front with ties at the waist. Unlined.

Blouse in airy cotton poplin with broderie anglaise, an opening at the top and a small frilled collar with ties at the front. 3/4-length sleeves with flounced cuffs and a seam at the hem with a wide flounce. Unlined.

Shirt in soft, checked cotton flannel with a concealed button-down collar, classic front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement over the shoulders and chest, which combined with a gently tapered waist creates a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
